Date: Thursday, 5/8/1976
Subject: Rickey Henderson learns new position
Rickey Henderson has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "A" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Saturday, 5/10/1976
Subject: Progress of Mark Clear
Dear Sir,
Mark Clear has nothing more to prove at A Bakersfield Dodgers!
He has an ERA of 3.00 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
